#include <ClimateCard.hpp> Include dependency graph for ClimateCard.cpp:
Detailed Description
Implementation file for the ClimateCard class.
This file contains the implementation of the ClimateCard class, which represents a climate control card. The ClimateCard class provides methods for controlling an air conditioner, reading temperature and humidity from sensors, and saving and loading the state to/from FRAM memory.
